attributes.action: Lock all airports in UK up for preventing spread of COVID19.
attributes.additional_details:
Lock all airports up to stop spread COVID19 in UK.how many flight from China, Iran, Italy and rest of Asia or Europe land in UK Everyday  ?
A lot of , no one checks this passengers and by this way we open the door for COVID19 to spread in UK instead stop it.
attributes.background:
Everyday thousands tourists come in UK.
Some of them can be potentially infected of COVID19.
No one checks it at the airports.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
